评论概述: Not really similar to the photo
评论详情: It doesn’t have sparkles like the photo and the design isn’t black like the photo, it’s dark blue. The shirt isn’t a nice fuzzy soft material, it’s more like the material used for sports shirts. It’s still cute and a good shirt, just not like the photo suggested at all. Just a tiny bit too much money for a product that isn’t very expected.
This is very much like the picture, its very comfortable, its not cotton though, its got a silky texture, I thought it was cotton, but its still comfy!
